entries.meaning: (rare) A man who is meekly subservient to his wife.
examples: The moment he allows the emphasis to swing the other way he becomes a sit-by-the-fire, a cockerel, a drone, a henpeck. A woman steps into this man's sphere at her peril.

verbs.description: henpeck (third-person singular simple present henpecks, present participle henpecking, simple past and past participle henpecked)

entries.meaning: (chiefly by a wife) To nag persistently.
